entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Caribou
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:36 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Caribou Point 10:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
Temperature: -0.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 58 %

Wind: SSW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Cloudy. High plus 2.

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Thursday 23 March 2023
